description: A best-selling, award-winning toner that gently exfoliates, hydrates, and soothes skin. Its lightweight water texture, rich in minerals from deep sea water, absorbs quickly to help maintain the skin's moisture balance.

A gentle, non-abrasive leave-on exfoliant that unclogs and diminishes enlarged pores, exfoliates dead skin cells, and smooths wrinkles. Dramatically improves skin's texture for a radiant, youthful, even-toned look.

Made with 77.78% Rice Extract, this toner is effective in brightening and improving elasticity. It forms a protective barrier over the skin to prevent water loss, eliminate dead skin cells, and provide luster and moisturization.

key_actives: Phenol, Lactic Acid, Salicylic Acid, Niacinamide
description: The original cult-favorite chemical exfoliant. This multi-functional lotion exfoliates, purifies, and regulates sebum, while helping to maintain the skin's acid pH. It enhances epidermal renewal for a purified, cleansed, and rebalanced complexion.

An ultra-hydrating Japanese lotion (toner) with a rich, essence-like texture. It's formulated with seven types of hyaluronic acid to deeply moisturize the skin, lock in moisture, and keep the skin hydrated all day long.

key_actives: Glycolic Acid, Ginseng Root Extract, Tasmanian Pepperberry
description: An alpha hydroxy acid (AHA) solution that offers mild exfoliation for improved skin radiance and visible clarity. The formula also improves the appearance of skin texture with continued use.

key_actives: Calendula Extract, Allantoin, Great Burdock Root
description: This cult-classic, alcohol-free toner is formulated with Calendula flower petals. It gently soothes and refreshes the skin, cleansing without harsh synthetic drying agents, leaving skin feeling balanced and revitalized.

A viscous, intensely hydrating toner that provides a moisture boost to the skin. Made with only seven essential ingredients, its star ingredient, milkvetch root extract, re-energizes and nourishes the skin.

product_name: Rose Petal Witch Hazel Facial Toner
key_actives: Witch Hazel Extract, Aloe Vera, Rosewater
description: An alcohol-free toner derived from a time-honored formula. This soothing toner helps to tone, cleanse, and moisturize the skin, leaving it feeling refreshed and balanced. The addition of rosewater provides a calming effect.

key_actives: AHA, BHA, PHA, Tea Tree Leaf Water, Niacinamide
description: A popular exfoliating toner that works to remove dead skin cells, shrink pores, and prevent breakouts. It features three types of chemical exfoliants, plus tea tree water to combat inflammation and niacinamide for brightening.

key_actives: Centella Asiatica Extract, Hyaluronic Acid, Panthenol
description: The essential oil-free version of the best-selling Klairs toner. It balances the skin's pH level and improves the effectiveness of your entire skincare regimen. It enhances hydration and helps reduce redness and irritation.

This cult-favorite tonic accelerates cell renewal to reveal a brighter, glowing complexion. It exfoliates, purifies, and tones the skin, helping to tighten pores and remove dead skin cells for a healthier look.

key_actives: Rose Fruit Extract, Rosewater, Hyaluronic Acid
description: A deeply hydrating and toning formula that uses real rose petals. It helps to cleanse the skin, remove impurities, and refine the appearance of pores for a soft, smooth complexion.

key_actives: Willow Bark Water (BHA), Apple Fruit Water (AHA), Allantoin
description: A gentle exfoliating toner that helps prevent blackheads and whiteheads. Formulated with natural AHA and BHA, it helps control excess sebum and remove dead skin cells, promoting a clearer and smoother complexion.
A low-pH toner formulated to soothe and calm stressed and irritated skin. It contains Panthenol and Madecassoside to hydrate and repair the skin barrier, making it perfect for sensitive skin types.

product_name: Ready Steady Glow Daily AHA Tonic
description: A gentle yet effective daily toner that exfoliates, brightens, tightens, and hydrates for a smooth, even, and energized complexion. It's formulated to limit irritation and is suitable for daily use.

A clarifying toner that completes the cleansing process by removing residual impurities and dead skin cells. It contains a mix of AHA and Pitera™ to exfoliate while conditioning the skin, preparing it for the rest of your routine.

A gentle exfoliating acne toner that penetrates deep into pores to remove debris and prevent breakouts. Formulated with both glycolic and salicylic acid, it helps to clear existing blemishes and smooth skin texture.

key_actives: Fermented Black Rice, Hyaluronic Acid, Beta-Glucan
description: A nourishing toner packed with antioxidants from fermented black rice. It provides intense hydration and helps to prep the skin for better absorption of other products, leaving it feeling plump and revitalized.

product_name: Watermelon Glow PHA + BHA Pore-Tight Toner
key_actives: PHA, BHA, Watermelon Extract, Hyaluronic Acid
description: A gentle, alcohol-free toner that hydrates skin and minimizes the appearance of pores. Infused with watermelon extract, PHAs, and BHAs, it helps to unclog pores and smooth skin texture for a glowing complexion.

key_actives: Willow Bark Extract (BHA), Papaya Extract, Rosewater
description: A multi-tasking toner and cleansing water that creates a clean base for the next steps in your skincare and makeup routine. It mildly exfoliates with willow bark and papaya extract to help sweep away dead skin cells.

A highly moisturizing and soothing toner formulated with 77% Heartleaf Extract. It helps to calm irritation, reduce redness, and balance the skin's pH, making it perfect for sensitive and troubled skin.

key_actives: Aloe Leaf Water, Salicylic Acid (BHA), Snail Mucin
description: A hydrating and exfoliating toner packed with aloe and salicylic acid. It helps to soothe irritated skin, provide moisture, and gently exfoliate dead skin cells and blackheads for a smoother complexion.

key_actives: Glycolic Acid, Grape Water, White Peony
description: A brightening, glycolic essence that works to sweep away dead skin cells, revealing a more radiant and even complexion. It helps to reduce the appearance of dark spots and prepares the skin for serum application.

key_actives: Ceramides, Peptides, White Leaf Tea Water
description: A unique 2-in-1 product that combines the rich hydration of a cream with the lightweight texture of a toner. It provides deep, long-lasting moisture and helps to strengthen the skin's barrier.

key_actives: Rice Bran Extract, Niacinamide, Chamomile Flower Extract
description: A viral toner known for delivering a 'glass skin' effect. This intensely hydrating and brightening toner is formulated with rice bran extract and niacinamide to illuminate the complexion and provide lasting moisture.

A cult-favorite Japanese lotion that deeply hydrates and soothes the skin. Its lightweight, watery formula absorbs quickly, leaving the skin feeling moisturized and refreshed. Can be used on the face and body.

key_actives: Jeju Green Tea Extract (80%), Centella Asiatica, Allantoin
description: A refreshing toner formulated with 80% green tea extract from Jeju Island. It helps to control excess sebum, soothe irritation, and provide a protective layer of antioxidants, leaving the skin feeling balanced and revitalized.

product_name: Fat Water Niacinamide Pore-Refining Toner Serum
key_actives: Niacinamide, Barbados Cherry, Australian Lemon Myrtle
description: A unique 2-in-1 toner-serum that targets pores, improves the look of dark spots, brightens, and smooths skin. Its thick, cushiony texture instantly hydrates while refining the skin without stripping.
A gentle, alcohol-free toner designed to promote a bright, even skin tone and less visible pores. Formulated with niacinamide, arbutin, and licorice root to target dullness and unevenness.

A high-moisture lotion (toner) formulated with sake, which is rich in amino acids. This generously sized toner deeply hydrates, brightens, and helps to improve the skin's barrier function, leaving it soft and supple.
A fine facial mist that provides a layer of soothing hydration to calm sensitive, irritated skin. It can be used as a toner or throughout the day to refresh and reduce redness.

A gentle exfoliating toner that contains high-quality Centella Asiatica from Madagascar to soothe and hydrate the skin. It also contains PHA, a gentle exfoliant suitable for sensitive skin, to help remove dead skin cells.

key_actives: Lactic Acid (8% AHA), Glycolic Acid (3% AHA), Kombucha Black Tea Ferment
description: A potent leave-on toner that works to smooth skin texture, minimize the appearance of pores, and firm the look of skin. The proprietary kombucha and AHA blend enhances the skin's natural microbiome.

key_actives: Avène Thermal Spring Water, Natural Silicates
description: A bi-phase toner that softens and protects the skin from external aggressors. Formulated with thermal spring water, it provides soothing and anti-irritating benefits. Alcohol-free and oil-free.
A gentle, alcohol-free toner that helps to restore the skin's protective barrier. The pH-balanced, non-drying formula removes leftover residue after cleansing while hydrating and comforting the skin.

key_actives: Licorice Root Water, Peony Extract, Green Tea Extract
description: A multi-tasking toner that deeply cleanses, hydrates, and brightens the skin. With a pH of 5.5, it effectively removes remaining impurities after cleansing while licorice water helps to illuminate the complexion.

product_name: Ultra Repair Wild Oat Hydrating Toner
description: An alcohol-free, oatmeal-powered toner that hydrates, relieves, and soothes skin. It helps to calm redness and nourish the skin, leaving it feeling comfortable and prepped for the rest of your routine.

A gentle chemical exfoliant designed for sensitive skin. The larger molecule size of PHA works on the skin's surface to remove dead skin cells, improve texture, and enhance hydration for a brighter, smoother complexion.

A serum-lotion that combines the power of a fresh lotion with the richness of a serum. It works to intensely hydrate the skin, strengthen the barrier, and visibly plump the skin for a more radiant appearance.

key_actives: Green Tea Extract, 5 types of Hyaluronic Acid
description: A lightweight, watery toner that delivers intense, lasting hydration. Formulated with antioxidant-rich green tea and multiple molecular weights of hyaluronic acid, it helps to replenish moisture and balance the skin.

An effective toner that clarifies, visibly tightens pores, and hydrates. Powered by white willow bark extract, a natural BHA, it gently exfoliates while sugarcane-derived squalane provides weightless hydration.

A quick-absorbing moisturizing toner with a sheer, watery texture that provides soothing hydration. The formula, infused with traditional Korean herbs, helps to comfort the skin and leave it feeling smooth and supple.

product_name: DIVE-IN Low Molecular Hyaluronic Acid Toner
description: A refreshing watery toner that focuses on deep hydration. It features a 5D-Complex of different molecular weights of hyaluronic acid to penetrate various layers of the skin, providing long-lasting moisture and comfort.

A pore-refining toner that helps to clarify and resurface the skin. The formula contains a gentle blend of AHA and BHA to target clogged pores and rough texture, while soothing extracts help to minimize irritation.

key_actives: Glycolic Acid (AHA), Lactic Acid (AHA), Witch Hazel Water
description: A potent, supercharged toner that targets dark spots, fine lines, and wrinkles. Powered by a high concentration of AHAs, it smoothes texture and reduces the look of discoloration for a more even, glowing complexion.

A fresh, nourishing essence-toner formulated with traditional Korean herbs (Hanbang). Rich in ginseng water, it provides deep hydration, nourishment, and helps to improve the look of fine lines and wrinkles.

product_name: Deep Sweep 2% BHA Pore Cleaning Toner
key_actives: Salicylic Acid (2% BHA), Moringa, Papaya Enzyme
description: An alcohol-free, 2% BHA toner that gently exfoliates, cleans pores, and controls oil without over-stripping skin. It helps draw out excess oil to help reduce shine and refresh the complexion.

product_name: Press & Glow Daily Exfoliating PHA Tonic
key_actives: PHA (Gluconolactone), Prickly Pear Extract, Aloe Vera
description: A hydrating acid toner that uses next-generation polyhydroxy acids (PHAs) to exfoliate the surface of the skin for a noticeable everyday glow. It's gentle enough for twice-daily use on even sensitive skins.
